animeDescription: Mami-chan has a crush on her school's soccer club star, Ishida-senpai, and tries against hope to work up the courage to give him chocolate for Valentine's Day. She learns from her friend Koko-chan of the mysterious Magical Chocolate. Will the magic make Mami's dream come true?(Source: AnimeNfo)
animeStaff: [['Ishikawa, Naoya', 'Director'], ['Morita, Shunsuke', 'Theme Song Performance, Theme Song Composition']]
